Name: Let's Go Sightseeing
Title: In the heart of Leh
Review: I visited this Gompa (monastery) to wrap up my Leh city tour. It's in the heart of the town, next to the Leh Market. It's not a big monastery but has quite calm & colorful interiors. Do note you've to remove your shoes to go inside.Also, photography is prohibited.

Name: Vipul Singh
Title: Secluded Stupa
Review: It's a secluded Stupa located near Leh Market. Not much to see here expect a glance while passing through the market road.

Name: SaddviAndalwala
Title: Amazing monastery
Review: Although this monastery was not a very big one, but the curios displayed inside the monastery and the ambience of the place together won my heart.

Name: Peregrineri
Title: Worth a visit
Review: In order to go inside, you have to call the number posted on one of the doors. It's not a big monastery, and not in perfect condition, but it is somewhat interesting. Since it's right by the palace, it's worth a visit.
